name: Hold the punch
description:
This is a demo... In fact, it just occurred to me to do something and I just want to express my love for furry and martial arts, and that's how this idea came about.

English is not my native language and most of it is done through a translator, although the menu itself is in another language to play, you just need to press enter.

This game will get a small completion, but it is a test of how the main one will work.

I wonder if there will be someone who will share my love for this and whether it is worth finishing and translating all this at all.
